text: Asian dude is just "this is okay"
I'll give her everything she wants
I can't plead ignorance or anything
And now she suddenly knows how to dress nicely
And isn't overwhelmed be the modern world
Joe shouldn't watch this
He'd have an aneurysm
lolololololoolloolllllololollllll
Westworld 7/10
I wanted to see Billy die
Yeah, I didn't see MiB being William
That was a crazy twist
But yeah anyways I thought it was okay overall
like you said i feel like theres a lot of plot holes
Yeah, if Felix was a host as well then I'd be more comfortable
But he wasn't
He was just an exaggerated pussy
lol
But if Felix was a host then it'd be too much and I'd suspect everyone of being a host. Season 2 doesn't come out until 2018
haha yeah i know shit...
Some people are theorizing that Ford created a host of himself and that's who actually died
That's my thought as well. However that would again make me think that everyone is a host.
Which ruins the whole thing
True
I didn't see Bernard being a host coming
That was a pleasant surprise
But that's as far as that should've went
Yeah that was probably the biggest twist for me
I would've been pissed if that chick trying to take over was a host
Somebody on reddit came up with that theory after like the first episode because Bernard Lowe is an anagram for Arnold Weber
So he made a post about "what if bernard is a host to represent arnold" and everyone called him stupid haha
Hahahah Thats why I hate Reddit. I would've been pissed to find out that he was right! That's funny that everyone shit on him for that idea
I was very confused when Logan pulled out that picture of his sister to remind William of his fiance and it was that same one that we saw in like episode 2
thats when i realized there had to be some weird timeline thing going on
Yeah! To be honest I didn't catch most of the timeline stuff until the end few episodes or exactly when some were revealed. It made them exciting lolol
Super interesting concept. But I feel like Maeve's part in all of this really killed it
They could've done better

Yeah, I mean when it came down to it, her role really wasn't that big... At least not as big as they made it seem like it would be. She was pretty much just there to distract security while the hosts in the park fucked shit up

and I never really fully understood how the park worked. Like the hosts cant hurt the guests... but they can a little bit...sorta. And how often does everything reset? and how long do the guests stay? is it like a one day thing or a week or a month or does everyone stay there at different times? lol I was hung up on that for a while in the beginning
